attributes.action: give local authorities more money to spend on youth projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: teenagers are alwyas being blamed for crimes and they always get bad publicity, so to counteract crimes performed by teenagers and to get teenagers off the street i propose that the government give councils more money to build or improve youth activities and provide such things as; cinemas, safe areas, more open land (parks). council's seem to spend money on activities for the younger generations and forget about the people aged 12-18
